comments:
Start a debug session and hit a breakpoint. 
Terminate the debug session and an error dialog is pop up with the following stack trace in the error log.

Caused by: org.eclipse.jface.util.Assert$AssertionFailedException: null argument;
at org.eclipse.jface.util.Assert.isNotNull(Assert.java:150)
at org.eclipse.jface.util.Assert.isNotNull(Assert.java:126)

Problem had to do with the loading flag not getting set properly in the MozillaBrowserEditor. The DOMInspector's tree content provider was placing a null document node in the tree and was causing an assertion.

This was introduced after making changes to the way the Editor handles events from the Browser widget. The current implementation relies more on DOM events (DOMContentLoaded, pageShow, pageHide, unload ) to notify the views of the state of the document loading.
